processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Copies of this collection were prepared by the Library and forwarded to the Council for placement in two other Virginia Institutions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection largely consists of the official minutes of the Executive Committee of, and of the Board of Directors of the Virginia Council. Also included are financial statements, as submitted to the Executive Committee or the Board, committee reports, some general correspondence of Board members and other, miscellaneous items such as brochures, reports, etc., and copies of the By Laws in various revisions. The collection provides an excellent source for the study of the VCHR, and is useful for civil rights and related subjects.
